Sentencas: To commercialize solid oxide fuel cells, many methods for reducing the production time of manufacturing a fuel cell membrane-electrode-assembly (MEA) using a non-vacuum process have been studied and still the post-heat treatment process is an issue.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: This paper discusses an alternative sintering method to replace the conventional thermal sintering step for ceramic thin film fabrication, which is time consuming and costly.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: We fabricated samarium-doped ceria (SDC) thin films, which has high ionic conductivity and high surface exchange coefficient for oxygen reactions at the cathode side.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The films were deposited by chemical solution deposition (CSD) method utilizing electrostatic spray deposition (ESD) technique.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Thermal decomposition and crystallization steps are required as a post-heat treatment process to obtain desired material properties.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: For this purpose, the flash light sintering method is adopted and compared with the conventional thermal sintering process using halogen furnace.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: With this flash light sintering method, the conventional post-heat treatment process time can be significantly reduced from tens of hours to a few seconds.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy, X-ray diffraction, and transmission electron microscopy analyses were carried out for material characterizations.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Additionally, electrochemical impedance analysis and current-voltage behavior measurements were conducted.
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: By successful fabrication of SDC cathodic functional layer utilizing flash light irradiation process, the 2-folds of fuel cell performance enhancement was obtained in terms of the peak power density at the measurement temperature of 450 degrees C. (C) 2021
Titulo: Flash light sintered SDC cathodic interlayer for enhanced oxygen reduction reaction in LT-SOFCs
